獝獝獝

獝字的基本解释

獝
xù
〔獝狂〕古代传说中的恶鬼。
（鸟）惊飞：“凤以为畜，故鸟不獝。”

獝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》況必切，入質，曉。］
(1)飞，惊飞。
(2)狂，狂放。
(3)见“獝狂”。

獝字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獝； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页718第21
【廣韻】况必切【集韻】休必切，?音矞。【玉篇】狂也。【集韻】驚遽貌。【禮·禮運】鳳以爲畜，故鳥不獝。【註】獝，飛之貌也。【疏】獝，驚飛也。【釋文】矞，字又作獝。况必反。【集韻】本作矞。或作?䎉。　又【玉篇】巨聿切【集韻】允律切，?音遹。義同。　又【集韻】獸走也。　又【韻會】揆聿切，音繘。【揚雄·甘泉賦】梢夔魖而抶獝狂。【註】孟康曰：獝狂，惡鬼。師古曰：獝，揆聿反。

獝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
獝字的起名意思

暂无。

Merry
Basic explanation of words
Merry
xù
〔Mong Kuang〕 The evil spirits in ancient legends.
(Bird) Startled to fly: "The phoenix thinks it is a beast, so the bird is not a scorpion."
Merry
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guangyun" the situation must be cut, into the quality, Xiao. ]
(1) Fly, start to fly.
(2) Crazy, wild.
(3) See "Madness".
Merry
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　獝; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 718 21
[Guang Yun] The situation must be cut [Ji Yun] Hugh must be cut, and the sound will be cut. [Jade articles] Crazy too. [Jiyun] Shocking appearance. 【Rite·Rite Fortune】The phoenix is a beast, so the bird does not. 【Note】Ji, the appearance of flying is also. 【Sparse】Jiang, startled to fly. 【Explanation】矞, the word is also made of 獝. The situation must be reversed. [Ji Yun] This is a scorpion. Or as? 䎉.　[Jade chapter] Juyu cut [Jiyun] Yunlu cut,? Yin 遹. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The beast is also walking.　[Rhyme Club] Press and cut, sound 繘. [Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu] Shao Kui is mad and crazy. [Note] Meng Kang said: Madness, evil spirits. Shi Gu said: 獝, retort.

Name meaning
Nothing.
yù, xù
I прил.
бешеный; буйный
狡獝 коварный и буйный

разбегаться в страхе, в ужасе разлетаться
